sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPATHELIA, in botany; a genus of plants belonging to the claſs of pentandria, and to the order of trigynia. The calyx is pentaphyllous ; the petals are five ; the capſule is three-edged and trilocular ; the ſeeds ſolitary. There is only one ſpecies, the si mplex, which is a native of Jamaica, and was introduced into the botanic gardens of this country in 1778 by Dr Wright, late of Jamaica.
